title: What comes first during a song composition, lyrics and vocals or music and drop? - Quora

response.answer_text: Believe it or not, it can come anyway. It usually starts with an idea or melody, but doesn’t have to. It can start with a beatbox or groove, or a chord progression! One size does not fit all here, some very good songwriters only believe it can be done one way. Their way! What usually comes first is what gets you to second. I have written songs with lyric ideas first, guitar riffs, chords, whatever.
Lyrics. But only the good songs. Like this one.
